wordpressPage.title: West Midlands
wordpressPage.content:
If you know of any West Midland based centres we should include here please let us know!

Whitemoor Lakes – Near Lichfield – Website

A brand new Conference & Activity Centre for groups of 12 to 300 – Whitemoor Lakes – Opened in October 2011.  The lakeside centre situated near Lichfield is set by a 40 acre Lake offering contemporary full board en-suite accommodation, full meeting facilities and an exciting range of instructed activities such as climbing, kayaking, high ropes, archery and much more.  The Centre is an ideal place for Church fellowship holidays, leaders conferences, youth weekends, Schools, Colleges and development training courses etc.  If you require further information, want to view the centre for yourself or would like me to come and visit you then please contact me,  Jon Munt, on 07714307865 or email jonmunt [at] actioncentres.co.uk .  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Woolhope Cocksfoot Christian Youth Centre – Hereford – Website

Woolhope is situated in Herefordshire and is a residential centre capable of sleeping up to 21 people. For more information please visit their website.

Quinta Christian Centre – Oswestry – Website

The Quinta Centre offers a variety of options for residentials and a variety of accommodation and meeting rooms. For full information please visit their website.

Kingswood Staffordshire – Wolverhampton – Website

ingswood Staffordshire centre was purpose-built for residential school visits and overlooks the picturesque beauty of the Wrekin and Clee Hills. A whole lot of fun packed into a compact centre, Staffordshire is ideal for younger visitors and with all the facilities within easy reach of the main buildings, makes close supervision easier.

Dunfield House – Kington – Website

Dunfield has been running for 52 years offering youth, church and school groups the opportunity to run their own programme. We can offer sole use of the site for up to 95 guests, along with the opportunity to book our main house sleeping 73 with a fully catered service and our stables accommodation sleeping 22 which can be booked either self catering or a catered option.
